title: Tanks are 2 strong
body: I dont  understand this anymore tanks shouldnt deal much dmg but then comes a cho gath which deals 1200 dmg with r to me as kindred unair as fck

replies.body:
If Tanks shouldn`t deal much damage, then an ADC shouldn`t be able to destroy them in 3 Seconds when he finished his build. Is there any Tank-Skill beside Feast that deals high damage? And Cho`s is absolutely not the best tank atm.

If you look who is played often and has high winrates on Toplane, yes there are some Tanks like Sion or Singed, but also Non-Tanks like Nasus or GP. Since you played Kindred, so I guess Jungle, you had the tools to take him out of the game. Cho is annoying if he gets some Feast-Kills and gets hard to kill, but he is immobile and easy to gank.

Das ist das deutsche Forum.
Spiel keinen Adc im Jungle wenn du ihn nicht spielen kannst, besondrs keinen der nur gut ist wenn man ihn perfektioniert hat.
Wenn du Tanks den Dmg wegnehmen willst, musst du sie Schadensressistenter machen. Aktuell können nähmlich diverse Assassnen Tanks ebenfalls oneshotten. 
*Hust* Rengar *Hust*
in evrey ranked i play  on the enemy tem theres min. 1 tank and hes always feed
Soviel Glück hätte ich auch mal gerne in Rankeds :/
